name: The Resurrection (PreAlpha)
description:
Explore, rebuild, discover, time travel. 

A narrative game where the story is told by the ruins of the past as you rebuild the remains of over 11,000 years of history. As you rebuild the past, you redirect the future.

Keep up-to-date as the game develops: https://tinyletter.com/MatchstickCathedral

**I released this version in order to keep a promise to myself. It is a little broken. This is very much a Pre-Alpha demo where you are likely to encounter all sorts of "interesting" issues. I'm working hard to fix all of these and will post updates here, but do please get in touch with any notes or suggestions. I would truly love to hear from you! Email me at: theresurrectiongame@gmail.com
